title: I have an Android version Jelly Bean and WhatsApp has updated to Kit Kat, so I couldn't download it. What should I do to get WhatsApp? - Quora

response.answer_text: That's impossible. You can download and run WhatsApp even on Gingerbread 2.3. There's definitely a connectivity issue preventing your download. Try with a better connection (3g or wifi) or ask a friend to send an apk.
Upgrade to a newer device if you can. Else use Whatsapp Mods available on the internet. Not recommended though. Most vendors would withdraw support for more older versions.
